FuncDef: This command specifies the error rate at which to declare the Signal Degrade condition on an Ethernet interface. The value represents M*10E-N a ratio of errored frames over total frames received over W seconds of the sliding window. The CRC errors on the interface are sampled once per second. A default of 10 seconds is used when there is no additional window-size configured. The multiplier keyword is optional. If the multiplier keyword is omitted orno sd-thresholdis specified the multiplier will return to the default value of 1.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the threshold value. Values-1 to 9.
Specifies the multiplier value. Values-1 to 9.
